roleset.name: remove core
roleset.note: CORE-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: milk (10.7) Edited by stacy, hwangd (from core.01-v)

role.descr: entity from which something is removed, what is being cored

example.name: With Arg2
example.text: Mary took the apple corer and cored the seeds.

example.name: With Arg1
example.text: I cored the tomatoes before blanching them.

example.name: All args
example.text: I peeled the squash, cored it of its stringy bits, and chopped it roughly.

roleset.name: hollow out or remove
roleset.note: CORE_OUT-V NOTES: Edited by stacy, hwangd (from core.03-v)

role.descr: entity from which something is removed, what is being cored

example.name: with Arg1
example.text: * Core out the new chimneys by removing pieces of brick and mortar.
example.arg: by removing pieces of brick and mortar

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: I cored out the seeds of the apples.
